src:
Sparatoria di Halloween in California: quattro morti
Qualcuno ha fatto fuoco durante una festa in un airbnb

01 Nov 2019, 10:31




Roma, 1 nov. (askanews) – Almeno quattro persone sono rimaste uccise in una sparatoria durante un party per Halloween a Orinda, in California. Lo ha riferito la televiasione locale KTVU, secondo la quale ci sono ancher diversi feriti.
La sparatoria è avvenuta nelle ultime ore di ieri. Gli spari sono avvenuti all’interno di una casa che era stata affittata via airbnb per una festa privata.
Secondo il Daily Mail, l’evento era stato promosso su Instagram come “AirBNB mansion party”.
Mos
text:
Halloween shooting in California: four dead
Someone fired during an airbnb party

01 Nov 2019, 10:31




Rome, Nov. 1 (askanews) - At least four people were killed in a shootout during a Halloween party in Orinda, California. Local TV news was reported by KTVU, according to which there are also several wounded.
The shooting took place in the last hours of yesterday. The shots took place inside a house that had been rented via airbnb for a private party.
According to the Daily Mail, the event was promoted on Instagram as "AirBNB mansion party".
Mos
